BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Maltese, S.147-A, and Assembly Member Pheffer, A.6619, “AN ACT to amend the surrogate’s court procedure act, in relation to the compensation of the public administrators”.
Items.MatterName: Compensation of the public administrators (S.147-A, A,.6619)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senators Padavan, Golden, Maltese, Marchi and Velella, S.2564-C, and Assembly Members Abbate, Colton, Cymbrowitz, Ortiz, Pheffer, Seddio, Seminerio and McLaughlin, et al, A.5464-C, “AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of a twenty year retirement program for members of the New York city employees’ retirement system employed as investigators by district attorneys’ offices”.
Items.MatterName: Establishment of a twenty year retirement program for members of the New York city employees' retirement system employed as investigators by district attorneys' offices (S.2564-C, A.5464-C)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Padavan, S.6430, and Assembly Members Grannis, McLaughlin, Dinowitz, Grodenchik, Lafayette, Bing, Gianaris, O’Donnell, Weprin and Perry, et al, A.9610-A, “AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to partial abatement of real property taxes”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Partial abatement of real property taxes (S.6430, A.9610-A)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Maltese, S.6190, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.9798, “AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of twenty-five year retirement programs for members of the New York city employees’ retirement system employed in probation officer positions”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establishment of twenty-five year retirement programs for members of the New York city employees' retirement system employed in probation officer positions (S.6190, A.9798)
